subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Over the years, confrontations with drivers have done nothing but reinforce Kurt Busch’s bad-boy reputation. But Ryan Newman had Busch to thank for his Daytona 500 victory on Sunday.
snippet: Over the years, confrontations with drivers have done nothing but reinforce Kurt Busch’s bad-boy reputation. But Ryan Newman had Busch to thank for his Daytona 500 victory on Sunday.
